https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2imRsgBbAk7QHvKcgWrfAgamp3P.jpg A budding director tries to research a merciless gangster for making a film on gangsterism. But her secret attempts to conduct the research fail when she gets caught for snooping. Bachchhan Paandey
